verses.text: Then I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, in the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w* that was above the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* there \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* over them as it were a \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of a \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.

And he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* the \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*, \add even\add* under the \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, and \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H2651"\w* with \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from \w between|strong="H0996"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, and \w scatter|strong="H2236"\w* \add them\add* over the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. And he went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft thine hand: Heb. the hollow of thine hand\f*

Now the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on the right \w side|strong="H3225"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*; and the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.

Then the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* went \w up|strong="H7311"\w* from the \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, \add and stood\add* over the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* was \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of the \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.  +  r 10.4  t went up: Heb. was lifted up *

And the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w cherubims’|strong="H3742"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add even\add* to the \w outer|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, as the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* when he \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w*.

And it came to pass, \add that\add* when he had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from between the \w wheels|strong="H1534"\w*, from between the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*; then he went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*.

And \add one\add* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from between the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* unto the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* that \add was\add* between the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \add thereof\add*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w hands|strong="H2651"\w* of \add him that was\add* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*: who \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 10.7 \ft stretched forth: Heb. sent forth\f*

¶ And there \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* the \w form|strong="H8403"\w* of a \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* under their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

And when I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, behold the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*: and the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \add was\add* as the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of a \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

And \add as for\add* their \w appearances|strong="H4758"\w*, they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* had \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w*, as if a \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* had been in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w*.

When they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* upon their \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sides|strong="H7253"\w*; they \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* not as they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, but to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whither the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* they \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* it; they \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* not as they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*.

And their whole \w body|strong="H1320"\w*, and their \w backs|strong="H1354"\w*, and their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, and the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*, \add were\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \add even\add* the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* that they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* had.\f + \fr 10.12 \ft body: Heb. flesh\f*

As for the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*, it was \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto them in my \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w*, O \w wheel|strong="H1534"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft it was…: or, they were called in my hearing, wheel, or, galgal\f*

And every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* had \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*: the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, and the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, and the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*.

And the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* were lifted \w up|strong="H7426"\w*. This \add is\add* the living \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* that I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*.

And when the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* by \w them|strong="H0681"\w*: and when the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* to mount \w up|strong="H7311"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the same \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \w also|strong="H1992"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* not from \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* them.

When they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, \add these\add* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*; and when they were lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, \add these\add* lifted \w up|strong="H7426"\w* themselves \add also:\add* for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the living \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* \add was\add* in them.\f + \fr 10.17 \ft of…: or, of life\f*

Then the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* from off the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* over the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*.

And the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, and mounted \w up|strong="H7426"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: when they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* also \add were\add* \w beside|strong="H5980"\w* them, and \add every one\add* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6931"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* over them \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.

This \add is\add* the living \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* that I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* under the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*; and I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that they \add were\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*.

Every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* had \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w apiece|strong="H0259"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*; and the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add was\add* under their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

And the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* the \w same|strong="H1992"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* which I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*, their \w appearances|strong="H4758"\w* and themselves: they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w straight|strong="H5676"\w* \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*.
